channel.title: Blog on Random Determinism
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Random Determinism

item.title: Using a static website instead of wordpress
item.description: I used to blog, mainly about ConTeXt, but occasionally about other stuff as well. My blog was hosted on Wordpress and it has been almost three years since I last posted there. A lot of things have happened in the interim, both in my professional and personal life. I enjoyed writing the blog and my posts on ConTeXt were reasonably popular; but after a while using the wordpress platform to write posts was a bit annoying.
